item.title: 国际货币基金组织在审查后批准向埃塞俄比亚支付2.61亿美元
item.description: 国际货币基金组织执行董事会同意向埃塞俄比亚立即拨付约2.61亿美元，此前该国已与债券持有人就债务重组达成原则性协议。【原文：The International Monetary Fund executive board agreed to immediately disburse about $261 million to Ethiopia after the nation reached an agreement in principle with bondholders to restructure its debt.】

item.title: 美国正密切审查科技巨头的人才收购行为，联邦贸易委员会主席表示
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席安德鲁·弗格森表示，该机构正密切关注大型科技公司挖角初创企业员工而非直接收购的行径。这种日益普遍的做法被视为规避反垄断审查的手段。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is taking a closer look at moves by major tech companies to hire away the employees of a startup instead of buying the venture outright, the agency’s Chairman Andrew Ferguson said, addressing a growing practice seen as a way to avoid antitrust review.】

item.title: NFL预测投注在赌博应用中热度攀升，相关股票却应声下跌
item.description: 周五，DraftKings公司、Flutter娱乐公司及其他与体育博彩行业相关的股票大幅下跌，此前最新数据显示这些公司可能正被预测市场初创企业的竞争产品所取代。【原文：DraftKings Inc., Flutter Entertainment PLC and other stocks linked to the sports gambling industry are tumbling on Friday after new data suggested that they may be losing ground to competing products from prediction market startups.】

item.title: 房利美、房地美股价困境加剧，首次公开募股疑云密布
item.description: 房利美和房地美股价延续数日跌势，因市场日益担忧特朗普总统的政策举措将影响解除这两家抵押贷款融资巨头政府控制的努力。【原文：Shares of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac extended days-long losing streaks amid mounting unease about the impact of President Donald Trump’s policy moves on efforts to release the mortgage-finance giants from government control.】

item.title: 法国总理提议预算改革以求稳定
item.description: 法国总理塞巴斯蒂安·勒科努提议全面修订其预算计划，他正竭力与主要反对党达成协议，以确保财政法案获得通过，避免政府再度垮台。【原文：French Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu proposed an overhaul of his budget plans as he strains for a deal with key opposition parties to secure a finance bill and avert another government collapse.】

item.title: 清街资本据称以120亿美元估值完成上市前融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，证券与衍生品经纪商Clear Street已完成一轮融资，估值达120亿美元，为首次公开募股铺平道路。【原文：Securities and derivatives broker Clear Street has closed an investment round at a $12 billion valuation, paving the way for an initial public offering, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI将在ChatGPT中测试定向广告，加速营收推进
item.description: OpenAI将开始在ChatGPT应用中为部分美国用户测试广告，这标志着该公司正寻求通过热门聊天机器人提升收入，此举具有重大战略意义。【原文：OpenAI will start testing advertisements in the ChatGPT app for certain US users, marking a major shift for the company as it seeks to bolster revenue from the popular chatbot.】

item.title: OpenAI将在ChatGPT中测试定向广告，加速营收推进

item.title: 投资者将不得不开始为忠诚度定价
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 制作一款优秀的侦探类电子游戏真的很难
item.description: 《布莱克庄园降神会》的制作团队表示，他们的游戏历经数年反复打磨才得以实现。【原文：The makers of ‘The Seance of Blake Manor’ say it took years of iteration for their game to work】

item.title: CD&R与TPG寻求蓝猫资本为25亿美元科维特鲁斯债务融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，克莱顿·杜比里尔与莱斯公司（Clayton Dubilier & Rice）及TPG公司正与包括蓝猫资本（Blue Owl Capital Inc.）在内的私募信贷机构洽谈，为兽医诊所技术公司Covetrus筹措至少25亿美元债务融资。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice and TPG Inc. are in talks with private credit firms including Blue Owl Capital Inc. to line up at least $2.5 billion of debt for Covetrus, a technology company for veterinary practices, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 恩布里奇公司提交监管文件以扩建部分主干线
item.description: 根据恩布里奇公司提交的监管文件显示，该公司计划在两年内将其从阿尔伯塔省延伸至美国的部分主干线输油管道网络扩容约10%。【原文：Enbridge Inc. plans to expand part of its Mainline oil pipeline network running from Alberta into the US by about 10% within two years, according to regulatory documents filed by the company.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称交易员对欧元剧烈波动准备不足
item.description: 摩根士丹利的戴维·亚当斯指出，交易员们低估了极端情景可能引发主要货币（尤其是欧元）断裂的风险。【原文：Traders are underpricing the risk of extreme scenarios potentially causing ruptures in major currencies, especially in the euro, according to Morgan Stanley’s David Adams.】

item.title: 刚果州矿商提议收购美国青睐的钴生产商
item.description: 刚果国有矿业公司刚矿业（Gecamines）提议收购切马夫公司（Chemaf SA），随后引入新的控股股东。随着市场对这家陷入困境的铜钴生产商的关注度日益升温，该收购计划应运而生。【原文：Congolese state-owned miner Gecamines has proposed acquiring Chemaf SA, before bringing in a new majority shareholder, as interest in the troubled copper and cobalt producer intensifies.】

item.title: 据称，KKR支持的Cengage正考虑在今年进行5亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由百仕通集团和KKR & Co.等机构支持的Cengage集团正考虑让这家全球教育科技公司首次公开募股，预计融资规模约为5亿美元。【原文：Cengage Group, which counts Apax Partners and KKR & Co. among its backers, is weighing an initial public offering of the global education technology company that could raise roughly $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，因特朗普对美联储的评论削弱降息预期
item.description: 美国国债价格下跌，交易员下调了对2026年美联储两次降息的预期。此前美国总统特朗普暗示，他将提名国家经济委员会主任凯文·哈塞特以外的人选接替美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔。【原文：Treasuries fell and traders trimmed their expectations for two US interest-rate cuts in 2026 after US President Donald Trump suggested he’d nominate someone other than National Economic Council director Kevin Hassett to succeed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: Zalando即将达成首笔美国客户交易，人工智能流量持续增长
item.description: 德国在线时尚平台Zalando SE即将宣布与美国客户的首笔交易，标志着该公司通过企业对企业服务正式进军美国市场。【原文：German online fashion platform Zalando SE is preparing to announce its first deal with an American client soon, marking a break into the US market with the company’s business-to-business offerings.】

item.title: 鲍曼呼吁美联储为就业市场持续疲软做好降息准备
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔·鲍曼表示，货币政策仍保持适度收紧，除非就业形势好转，否则官员们应准备进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman said monetary policy remains moderately restrictive and officials should be prepared to lower interest rates further unless the employment landscape improves.】

item.title: 马斯克炮轰瑞安航空老板，两位尖锐CEO的争斗不断升级
item.description: 一场原本相当无害的辩论，在两位直言不讳的企业领袖之间展开后，很快便升级为一场丑陋的争吵，双方互相辱骂，不留情面。【原文：It didn’t take long for a fairly innocuous debate between two outspoken corporate leaders to escalate into an ugly brawl, name-calling and all.】

item.title: 特朗普对提名哈塞特担任美联储主席一事表示犹豫
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普对提名凯文·哈塞特担任美联储主席一事态度犹豫，这使得他寻找下一任央行行长的计划蒙上更多疑云。【原文：President Donald Trump expressed reluctance toward nominating Kevin Hassett as Federal Reserve chair, casting further doubt over his search for the next head of the central bank.】

item.title: 商品交易商Mercuria公司对13亿美元利润仅缴纳0.08%的税款
item.description: 据彭博新闻社获得的财务报表显示，在截至9月的12个月里，墨丘利能源集团有限公司对超过10亿美元的利润几乎未缴纳任何税款。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. paid almost no tax on profits of more than $1 billion in the 12 months through September, according to a copy of its accounts seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 私人飞机热潮推动机库建造商Sky Harbour进军市政市场
item.description: 天港集团公司是一家为超级富豪建造专属机库、停放私人飞机的企业，该公司正转向免税市政债券市场筹集1亿美元资金，以支持其业务扩张计划。【原文：Sky Harbour Group Corp., a builder of exclusive hangars where the ultra-wealthy park their private aircraft, is turning to the tax-exempt municipal bond market to borrow $100 million as it seeks to expand.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰将收购基金投资者欲套现的股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，蓝鸮资本公司计划开始从寻求套现的投资者手中收购私募资产基金的二手份额，借此把握此类交易激增的机遇。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. plans to start buying secondhand stakes in private-asset funds from investors looking to cash out, taking advantage of a boom in such transactions, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心指数五个月来首次下滑
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商信心指数1月意外下滑，因高昂的销售激励措施抵消了近期抵押贷款利率下降及总统住房提案带来的提振效应。【原文：Confidence among US homebuilders unexpectedly fell in January, as costly sales incentives outweighed a recent boost from lower mortgage rates and the president’s housing proposals.】

item.title: 标普500指数延续涨势，科技巨头股受人工智能交易推动走高
item.description: 美国股市周五延续涨势，科技股的狂热行情已持续至第二日。【原文：US stocks extended gains on Friday as the euphoria over technology stocks continued for a second day.】

item.title: 九一集团认为非洲债券市场是追逐收益者的丰厚猎场
item.description: Ninety One Plc认为，非洲广阔的债券市场——这个曾因经济风险而遭投资者回避的新兴市场角落——正为寻求更高回报的投资者提供机遇。【原文：Ninety One Plc sees Africa’s broad bond market, a corner of emerging markets once shunned because of its economic risks, as an opportunity for investors looking for bigger returns.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔时隔七年重返全球债务市场
item.description: 厄瓜多尔正准备重返国际债务市场，这是该国自2019年以来首次回归。【原文：Ecuador is readying its return to international debt markets for the first time since 2019.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利顶级基金避开巴西、哥伦比亚，因选举忧虑
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司正回避巴西和哥伦比亚的本地债务，因预算缺口不断扩大，加剧了对两国今年总统大选前局势的担忧。【原文：Morgan Stanley Investment Management is shunning local debt from Brazil and Colombia as ballooning budget gaps add to concerns ahead of this year’s presidential elections in the two nations.】

item.title: ClickHouse在人工智能数据库竞赛中斩获150亿美元估值
item.description:
Dragoneer正为这家初创企业领投一轮4亿美元的融资。

【原文：

Dragoneer is leading a $400 million funding round for the startup.

】

item.title: 意大利央行估计第四季度国内生产总值小幅上升
item.description: 意大利央行表示，尽管面临全球逆风，欧元区第三大经济体在第四季度可能仍"保持温和扩张"。【原文：The Bank of Italy said the euro zone’s third-biggest economy probably “continued to expand moderately” in the fourth quarter despite global headwinds.】
